Ingredients.6: 4 cups almond milk, or as needed

Ingredients.7: 3 teaspoons ground black pepper, or to taste

Directions.1: Break sausage apart in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook until starting to brown, 3 to 5 minutes. Add Worcestershire sauce and let it heat up before adding beef bouillon and nutmeg. Stir and cook sausage until no longer pink, 3 to 5 minutes more.

Directions.2: Reduce heat to medium-low and sprinkle in flour gradually. Cook, stirring constantly, until flour coats sausage and is completely absorbed. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes more.

Directions.3: Pour in almond milk gradually, stirring constantly until gravy starts to thicken, up to 12 minutes. Add a little more almond milk if too thick. Season with pepper and salt. Continue stirring vigorously until gravy reaches desired thickness.

Directions.4: Remove from heat and let cool. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired.
